item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 16, 2025 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. 100x defect tolerance: How we solved the yield problem (108 points | 73 comments)
2. I have made the decision to disband Hindenburg Research (200 points | 70 comments)
3. Why is Cloudflare Pages' bandwidth unlimited? (380 points | 239 comments)
4. OpenAI Fails to Deliver Opt-Out System for Photographers (51 points | 17 comments)
5. Ropey – A UTF8 text rope for manipulating and editing large text (188 points | 76 comments)
6. dnSpyEx: .NET debugger and assembly editor (70 points | 9 comments)
7. Why the weak nuclear force is short range (289 points | 138 comments)
8. Sweden brings more books and handwriting practice back to its schools (2023) (289 points | 200 comments)
9. Lambda Calculus in 383 Bytes (2022) (229 points | 36 comments)
10. Google is making AI in Gmail and Docs free, but raising the price of Workspace (125 points | 168 comments)
11. Modern JavaScript for Django developers (148 points | 84 comments)
12. Code reviews: A success story (38 points | 32 comments)
13. Show HN: I built a fair alternative to Product Hunt for indie makers (97 points | 31 comments)
14. Empirical Health (YC S23) is hiring interns to build data-driven primary care ( | hide)
15. First AI-generated and 3D-printed shoe makes its dubious debut (4 points | 4 comments)
16. Israel, Hamas reach ceasefire deal to end 15 months of war in Gaza (134 points | 198 comments)
17. Nobody cares (265 points | 272 comments)
18. Sky-scanning complete for Gaia (142 points | 39 comments)
19. Apache DataFusion (22 points | 8 comments)
20. Sutton Hoo and Syria: Anglo-Saxons who served in the Byzantine army? (16 points | 4 comments)
21. TikTok preparing for U.S. shut-off on Sunday (483 points | 1380 comments)
22. Scheduled tasks in ChatGPT (85 points | 44 comments)
23. Arnold's Cat (2018) (26 points | 4 comments)
24. US will ban cancer-linked Red Dye No. 3 in cereal and other foods (240 points | 402 comments)
25. Homomorphic encryption in iOS 18 (319 points | 168 comments)
26. Take the pedals off the bike (408 points | 405 comments)
27. Train faster static embedding models with sentence transformers (36 points | 1 comment)
28. (Right-Nulled) Generalised LR Parsing (53 points | 1 comment)
29. Natrium 'advanced nuclear' power plant wins Wyoming permit (62 points | 35 comments)
30. TSMC begins producing 4-nanometer chips in Arizona (363 points | 315 comments)
